data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barták, Miroslav, Kubík, Štěpán (2018): Hybotidae (Diptera) from Turkey, with descriptions of seven new species. Zootaxa 4410 (3): 453-482, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4410.3.2|178 occurrences
